structure.unit: PART 9 - PARKS, RECREATION AND CULTURAL AFFAIRS

law.text: There is hereby established, pursuant to Raleigh City Charter ยง22 [ยง2.14] a Raleigh Arts Commission, as the official municipal advisory body on the arts broadly defined, which will promote, coordinate and strengthen public programs to further the cultural development of the City. (Ord. No. 1977-578, ยง1, 7-5-77)
